verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Niruhusu Yesu wangu
nijongee meza yako,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
unisamehe dhambi ,
mwokozi uje rohoni mwangu

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
uniokoe njoo kwangu ndani
nami nikae ndani yako,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
ili nipate amani tele
ndani ya roho yangu nifarijike

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
(hata nafsini mwangu)
wewe ndiwe tabibu pekee wa

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
roho yangu tena ndiwe
kimbilio langu*2

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
1.Tazama Yesu wangu ninajongea
karamu yako, pengine kwako Bwana

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
sistahili kuijongea, unihurumie
ee Yesu wangu unisamehe

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: 2.Hakika kwako Bwana makosa mengi nimeyatenda, ubinadamu wangu siwezi

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
3.Ni wazi Yesu wangu unajuua
udhaifu wangu, sina cha kujitetea mbele

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: zako ee Yesu wangu,unihurumie ee Yesu wangu unisamehe
